tackle.name: Tackle
tackle.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

growl.name: Growl
growl.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

vine_whip.name: Vine Whip
vine_whip.description: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

ember.name: Ember
ember.description: The target is attacked with small flames. This may also leave the target with a burn.

bubble.name: Bubble
bubble.description: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing team. This may also lower their Speed stats.
